name: CopiedBanner12「复制横幅12」
author: pxcex
description: 「我们想要在iOS通知中心或“锁屏横幅”中进行的许多操作之一，但是不能包括将文本从“通知”复制到剪贴板并将其粘贴到我们喜欢的任何位置的功能。」One of the many things we want to do in the iOS Notification Center or Lockscreen Banner but cannot include the ability to copy text from Notifications to Clipboard and paste them anywhere we like. This tweak solves this annoyance by allowing users to simply copy the text from a notification or lockscreen banner no matter which app it belongs to simply long pressing on the notification.
